mapper.select: select pac.firstname||pac.lastname as name , pac.cpf__c as personCPF , pac.row_id as contactId , pac.personmobilephone as personCell , psr.protocol__c as protocol from process.account pac left join process.service_request psr on pac.row_id = psr.contact_row_id__c where pac.personmobilephone = #{phoneNumber} case when char_length(#{phoneNumber}) < 14 then (pac.personhomephone = #{phoneNumber} or pac.companyphone__pc = #{phoneNumber} or pac.personmobilephone = #{phoneNumber}) when char_length(#{phoneNumber}) > 14 then pac.personmobilephone = #{phoneNumber} end limit 1
